name: FacebookSPACE
description:
A different look for your facebook. Space-themed, with dark colors and an improved chat sidebar.

Please report any problems you have.
additional_info:
april 10th - v1.5: fixed some text not being readable enough, made photo/video theater transparent
april 5th - v1.4: more fixes
april 4th - v1.3: removed some white/blue lines on the page
april 2nd - v1.2: some more fixes
april 1st - v1.1: fixed friend requests, chat and notifications buttons
mar 30th - v1: may still need improvements
